name: AmbiScug
description: DO YOU WISH ARTI WAS BETTER THAN SHE ALREADY IS? HAVE YOU EVER WISHED THAT SAINT COULD HOLD TWO(2) SPEARS AT THE SAME TIME NO MATTER HOW USELESS IT IS? WELL THIS IS THE MOD FOR YOU! This mod adds options to make the rw and dp scugs be able to hold a spear in each hand and let's you turn that off for Spearmaster to make it harder
